entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 11:57AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ACCUMULATING SNOW LIKELY SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY... A complex area of low pressure moving toward the region from the Gulf of Alaska will bring accumulating snow to the Matanuska Valley Saturday evening through Sunday. While there may be some periods of flurries or light snowfall this afternoon, the accumulating snow should begin this evening with heaviest rates

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 11:44AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED FOR ANCHORAGE... A winter weather advisory has been issued for Anchorage for 4 to 11 inches of snow through Sunday evening, with the highest amounts across East Anchorage, Eagle River, and the Anchorage Hillside. Please visit weather.gov/afc for more details.

entry.summary: ...Water levels rising on creeks and streams in Inyo County... Snowmelt in the southern Sierra Nevada of Inyo will start to accelerate with the onset of warmer temperatures.
